# Copilot Instructions

## Language Requirements

**All project documentation and code comments must be written in English.**

This includes:

- Code comments (inline, block, JSDoc, etc.)
- README files and other documentation
- Commit messages
- Variable and function names (use English terms)
- Error messages and user-facing text
- Code documentation and API descriptions

## Code Style

- Use clear, descriptive English names for variables, functions, and classes
- Write comments in English to explain complex logic
- Maintain English documentation in all markdown files
- Keep consistency across the entire codebase
